content:
ProfileAuthenticationOption Enum

Definition

Describes the authentication type of user profiles to be searched.

In this Article

public enum ProfileAuthenticationOption
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
ProfileAuthenticationOption

Remarks

The ProfileAuthenticationOption enumeration is used by profile providers and the ProfileManager class when they search for profiles in the data source and when they delete them. The ProfileAuthenticationOption enumeration is used to select whether only anonymous, only authenticated, or all profiles are searched.

Fields

All

Search all profiles.
Anonymous

Search only anonymous profiles.
Authenticated

Search only authenticated profiles.
